record.title: STEPHANIE TUBBS JONES GIFT OF LIFE MEDAL ACT OF 2008
record.narrative:
STEPHANIE TUBBS JONES GIFT OF LIFE MEDAL ACT OF 2008 -- (Senate - October 01, 2008)

[Page: S10396]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 7198 which was received from the House.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 7198) to establish the Stephanie Tubbs Jones Gift of Life Medal for organ donors and the family of organ donors.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times and passed, the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table with no intervening action or debate, and that any statements related to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 7198) was ordered to a third reading, read the third time, and passed.
